description: We are 2 roommates in our thirties. We attach a lot of importance to design & cleanliness! neighborhood_overview: Prenzlauer Berg is one of the most bustling neighbourhoods in Berlin, with an abundance of shops, bars, cafes and restaurants. It belonged to the former East Berlin, but was one of the first areas to begin gentrification, and is now a great mix of old and new Berlin. There is a supermarket right next door, and plenty of eating options within 1-2 minutes walk. Highlights include an amazing Japanese place 1 minute away, Berlin's best ice cream 3 minutes away, and a little further afield an amazing traditional German restaurant that is off the tourist trail, as well as Berlin's oldest and biggest beer garden. All of the tourist attractions are very easy to get to, and there is a good place nearby to rent bicycles (the best way to get around!).
